mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.expected_rate as expectedRate, p.start_money as startMoney, p.surplus_money as surplusMoney, p.product_introduce as productIntroduce, l.loan_use as loanUse, l.loan_limittime as loanLimittime, l.loan_amount as loanAmount FROM products p LEFT JOIN loan l ON l.lid = p.loan_lid WHERE p.pid=#{pid}
